name: Italian Rice Salad
keywords: artichoke hearts, basil, capers, cooked rice, dill, green pepper, olive oil, parsley, red onion, red wine vinegar, scallops, shrimp, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 pound shrimp, cooked, peeled and sliced in half lengthwise
1 to 1 1/2 cups cooked quartered artichoke hearts
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Saute scallops in hot butter for about 3 minutes, just enough to cook them lightly.
Combine scallops with remaining salad ingredients in serving bowl.
Whisk oil with vinegar and beat in remaining dressing ingredients. Pour over salad and toss gently.
Chill or serve at room temperature. It is better if salad is not too cool, for this detracts from the flavors.
